Name: user_story_must_have_acceptance_criteria
Description: Every User Story must have acceptance criteria defined

Name: user_story_status_cannot_be_done_if_not_in_sprint
Description: A User Story cannot be 'done' unless assigned to a Sprint

Name: task_type_may_match_bug_or_chore
Description: Task type may match 'bug' or 'chore' (optional allowance)

Name: sprint_end_after_start
Description: Each Sprint must end after it starts

Name: sprint_backlog_status_active
Description: Sprint Backlog must be in an active/valid status

Name: sprint_goal_achievement_status_defined
Description: Each Sprint Goal must have an achievement status defined

Name: scrum_board_columns_defined
Description: Scrum Board columns must be defined (todo/done/...)

Name: worker_availability_positive
Description: Workers must have non-zero availability for assignment

Name: product_backlog_status_defined
Description: Product Backlog must have a status defined

Name: role_area_of_responsibility_defined
Description: Roles must specify area of responsibility

Name: blocker_status_cannot_match_done_without_task
Description: Blocker cannot be 'done' without being linked to a task

Name: release_plan_planned_date_defined
Description: Release Plan must have a planned date
